articles.title: 'Getting seasick' The Ipcress File viewers fume over 'annoying' issue with ITV series - Express
articles.description: THE IPCRESS FILE is an all-new spy thriller which landed on ITV on Sunday evening. However, many viewers were left distracted by an 'annoying' feature with the Cold War mini-series.
